## Introduction

[Ashutosh Nandeshwar](https://nandeshwar.info) is a data science executive with over 18 years of experience in spearheading technical product solutions in AI, machine learning, and data visualization. He currently leads the data science practice at [CCS Fundraising](https://www.ccsfundraising.com).

Previously, Ashutosh has built high-performing teams at top institutions like the **University of Southern California**, *University of Michigan*, and California Institute of Technology, significantly enhancing data-driven decision-making and revenue generation. With a Ph.D. specializing in machine learning, Ashutosh is a recognized thought leader, known for transforming complex data insights into strategic business outcomes with clarity and engaging storytelling.
